# SKProductsRequestDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of methods the delegate implements so it receives the product information your app requests.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol SKProductsRequestDelegate : SKRequestDelegate
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductsRequestDelegate] protocol declares methods that are implemented by the delegate of an [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKProductsRequest] object. The delegate receives the product information that the product request referred to. Your app uses this information when presenting products to users in its in-app store.



## Receiving the Response

- **productsRequest(_:didReceive:)**: Accepts the App Store response that contains the app-requested product information.

## Setting the Delegate

- **delegate**: The delegate that receives the response of the app’s products request.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- SKRequestDelegate
